get.description: Get total token supply at height

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The key block height after which the tokens are summed

200.description: Total token supply at height divided in categories

pof_hash.description: "no_fraud" | api encoded Proof of Fraud hash

state_hash.description: Root hash of the channel's internal state tree
Root hash of the channel's internal state tree after the deposit had been applied to it
Root hash of the channel's internal state tree after the withdraw had been applied to it

update.description: Update to be applied. Must be a OffChainCallContract

block_hash.description: The block hash the forced progress used as an on-chain environment

offchain_trees.description: The whole set of off-chain state trees

poi.description: Proof of inclusion containing information for closing the channel
Proof of inclusion containing information for closing the channel

block_hash.description: Value "none" means no block in the chain includes the transaction

return_type.description: The status of the call 'ok | error | revert'.

data.description: Log event data (as contract byte array).

call.description: Source code for a contract with a function __call() = f(args), if calling a function f

arguments.description: Contract call data init function arguments (deprecated, use call)

call.description: Source code for a contract with a function __call() = init(args)

function.description: Contract call data function (deprecated, use call)

arguments.description: Contract call data function arguments (deprecated, use call)

call.description: Source code for a contract with a function __call() = f(args), if calling a function f

contract_id.description: Address of the contract to be created

deposit.description: Amount of tokens to deposit to the new contract

amount.description: Amount of tokens to transfer to the contract

gas.description: Gas limit for the contract call

gas_price.description: Gas price for the contract call

contract_oracles.description: Tokens in contracts registered as oracles

oracles.description: Tokens in accounts registered as oracles

pending_rewards.description: Tokens from fees and coinbase pending in the beneficiary reward delay

total.description: Sum of all tokens from other fields
